result.execSummary:
All charges against John Randall Scheet in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. John Randall Scheet is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John Randall Scheet

defendant.name: Scheet, John Randall
defendant.address: 455 S Arch Av, New Richmond, WI 54017

records.addlTxt: $25 bond moved from 22CF398 to 21CF706 to be applied to costs.  gll

9:54 AM Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: K Kittel. Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore in court  w/John Randall Scheet.  INCLUDES: 21CF706 and 22CF398. Set for FPT.  Atty Larimore files pea questionnaire. Atty Becker states joint recommendation. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. S/T DE. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to Ct 2 in 21CF706. Court questions Defendant.  Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty to Ct 2 in 21cf706. Court dismisses Counts 1,3, and 4 in 21CF706 and dismisses 22CF398 in its entirety. Sentencing arguments. Court makes statements. Court orders:  

Court Orders:  S/W 3 years' probation with conditions:    
Count 1 - 21CF706
-  6 months condition time STAYED;  73 days credit (unless notified different by Attys no later than 9/14). 
- Court Costs: $268.00; apply bond in both 21CF706 and 22CF398, balance through probation
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $250.00; apply bond in both 21CF706 and 22CF398, balance through probation
- Complete treatment court application and if accepted, successfully complete program 
- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician 
- testing randomly and regularly 
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol
- Not to associate with any persons known or suspected to be involved in use, trafficking, dealing or manufacturing of illegal drugs except in a treatment setting.
- Cooperate with any other evaluation, assessment and/or program as requested
- Subject to random UA's and PBT's
- Follow rules and regulations of Agent
- Pay supervision fees
- Sign up for probation by 4:30 pm 9/922 

Court notes it would consider early release from probation if successfully completes treatment court and has a favorable recommendation by Agent. 
20 days to appeal. 

Adjourned at : 10:22 am.

3:27 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant John Randall Scheet in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore in court for John Randall Scheet.  Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CF706 (PTC) & 22CF398 (ARGN).  On 22CF398- Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG pleas to both counts. Court reviews files.  Atty Larimore states there is no resolution at this time.  ADA Becker requesting to schedule JT with JA on Monday 7/11/22. Adjourned at 3:29 AM. bph

08:07 AM  Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY:  Joel Kenneth Larimore, DF: John Randall Scheet appeared from jail. INCLUDES 21CF706 (PTC) and 22CF398 (PH). 22CF398: S/T - Detective Joseph Kastens. Direct by ADA Becker. Counsel arguments. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Court sets ARGN on 22CF398. Bond continues in form and amount. Adjourned: 8:19 AM. kma  Arraignment scheduled for July 8, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
filed by Travis Satorius; hereby appointing Atty J. Larimore. arc
Pre-trial conference on June 27, 2022 at 08:00 am.

11: 10 AM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, ADA: Michael Becker, DF ATTY: Joel Kenneth Larimore, DF: John Randall Scheet appeared from jail.  Includes 21CF706 (PLEAS) & 22CF398 (STC).  Atty Larimore states due to new file there is not a deal at this time, requesting to schedule a JT.  Court notes PH needs to be scheduled on 22CF398, Atty Larimore waives timelimits.  Court requesting both files trail and after PH on 22CF398 Court will schedule JT on older file. Adjourned at 11:14 AM. bph  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Status conference on June 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.
SJN to SRN on record 6/15/22. kma

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

01:31 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA:   Brian Thomas Smestad and Intern Ali Casey, DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  John Randall Scheet appeared from jail. DE does not qualify for public defender, Atty. Larimore represents DE on underlying file. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. State requests bond. Court orders bond. Court administratively transfers to Branch 3. Court sets STC in Branch 3. Adjourned: 1:34 PM. kma  Status conference scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Initial appearance on June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
